file.title: Index of regular

p.text: command searches the text you specified template regular expression (for example, "Figure 1 \. (jpg | gif | png)") and returns the number of characters, from whom, is your search string. If nothing is found not to be, the command will return the value "0". To learn how to write regular expressions can be read here http://ru.wikipedia.org/wiki/Регулярные_выражения.
